overview: In order to fulfill her mother's last wish, sister Pearl plans to find a boyfriend within one month, before her 40th birthday. At this time, she has difficulties at work, and she felt the anxiety and suffers from insomnia. Pear meets some unreliable men, but also some unexpected stories. One night after another, she wanders in colorful Guangzhou city, looking for the life and passion that she subconsciously  doesn't want to accept nor lose.
title: Ms. Pearl
